title: Libra: Leveraging Temporal Images for Biomedical Radiology Analysis
details: X Zhang, Z Meng, J Lever, ESL Ho - arXiv preprint arXiv:2411.19378, 2024
abstract: Radiology report generation (RRG) is a challenging task, as it requires a thorough understanding of medical images, integration of multiple temporal inputs, and accurate report generation. Effective interpretation of medical images, such as chest …
